name: region_birth
label: Region of birth
description: Region of birth, adapted from the World Bank classification

name: edu
label: Own education
description: Education of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: study_id
label: Study id
description: Unique identifier number for the study

name: study_country
label: Country of study
description: Country of the study

name: cob
label: Country of birth
description: Country of birth

name: ethn1
label: Ethnic background based on country of origin
description: Ethnic background based on country of origin

name: ethn2
label: Ethnic background based on colour
description: Ethnic background based on colour

name: ethn3
label: Ethnic background, best estimate
description: Best estimate of ethnic background based on ethn1 or ethn2 and study's own discretion

name: occup
label: Own occupational status
description: Occupational status of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hhincome_own
label: Own household income
description: Total yearly household of the study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: famsize_adult_own
label: Number of adults in the household
description: Total number of adults in the same household of study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: famsize_child_own
label: Number of children in the household
description: Total number of children under 18 years old in the household of study participant. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_ever
label: Smoking, ever
description: Has the study participant ever smoked regularly? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_cess
label: Smoking cessation
description: Age in years when the study participant stopped smoking. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_cig
label: Smoking, number of cigarrettes
description: Average number of cigarettes smoked per day. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: smk_curr
label: Current smoking status
description: Current smoking status. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: alc
label: Alcohol intake
description: Does the study participant currently drink alcohol? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: alc_unit
label: Alcohol intake, units
description: Average units of alcohol per week. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: outdoor
label: Child’s outdoor play duration
description: Time spent playing outdoors. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: outdoor_season
label: Child’s outdoor play duration, season when asked
description: Season of outdoor collection. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: sedentary_time
label: Sedentary behaviour
description: Total screen time per day (time spent watching TV / playing video games / using a tablet; a smartphone). Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: pa_mod_vig
label: Physical activity, moderate to vigorous
description: Total duration of moderate to vigorous physical activity per week. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: pa_mod
label: Physical activity, moderate based on MET categories 3-6
description: Total duration of moderate physical activity per week based on METs classification (3-6 METs). Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: pa_vig
label: Physical activity, vigorous based on MET categories >6
description: Total duration of vigorous physical activity per week based on METs classification (>6 METs). Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: sleep_duration
label: Sleep duration
description: Time spent sleeping per day. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: diet_veg
label: Vegetables without potatoes
description: Vegetables intake, without potatoes. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_fruit
label: Fruits
description: Fruits intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_fish
label: Fish and fish products
description: Fish and fish products intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_swebev
label: Sugar-sweetened beverages
description: Sugar-sweetened beverages intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_na
label: Sodium intake
description: Sodium intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: diet_kcal
label: Daily kcal intake
description: Daily kcal intake. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: ap_age
label: Age at adiposity peak
description: Age at adiposity peak in days. Age when the individual experienced their highest BMI between birth and 2 years.

name: ap_bmi
label: BMI at adiposity peak
description: BMI at adiposity peak. Highest BMI reached between birth and 2 years.

name: ar_age
label: Age at adiposity reobund
description: Age at adiposity rebound in days. Age when the individual experienced their lowest BMI.

name: ar_bmi
label: BMI at adiposity rebound
description: BMI at adiposity rebound. BMI when the individual experienced their lowest adiposity.

name: phv_age
label: Age at peak height velocity
description: Age at which the individual experienced their fastest upward growth in their stature. Note: this can be estimated only if the participant has at least two height measures recorded between ages 5 and 20 years AND at least one of the height measures recorded at or after age 9 years

name: voice_break_age
label: Age at voice break
description: Age at which voice started to change/break (males only)

name: menarche_age
label: Age at menarche
description: Age at menarche (females only)

name: chd_cabg
label: Coronary events and incidents, coronary artery bypass graft
description: Coronary events and incidents: Coronary artery bypass graft. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: tanner_breast
label: Tanner stages of breast development
description: Tanner stages (I-V) of breast development (females only). Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: tanner_genit
label: Tanner stages of genitalia development
description: Tanner stages (I-V) of testes, scrotum, and penis development (males only). Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: death_cause
label: Mortality, cause of death
description: Cause of death.

name: tanner_pubhair
label: Tanner stages of pubic hair development
description: Tanner stages (I-V) of pubic hair development. Provide repeated measures in long format. Age represents the age of the study participant in years at the time of the measurement.

name: menopause_age
label: Age at menopause
description: Age at menopause in years (females only)

name: cimtmeanmax
label: Mean or max carotid intima-media thickness
description: Is the reported carotid intima-media thickness mean or maximum? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in days.

name: diab_t2_icd
label: Type 2 diabetes, ICD10 codes
description: Type 2 diabetes based on ICD10 code. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: diab_t2_sr
label: Type 2 diabetes, self reported
description: Type 2 diabetes based on self-reported measure. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hypertension
label: Hypertension
description: Hypertension status based on physician diagnosis: either being told by a physician or medical records.  Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hypertension_med
label: Hypertension, use of anti-hypertensive medication
description: Use of anti-hypertensive medication. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: chd_hard
label: Coronary events and incidents, hard definition
description: Has the study participant had coronary events (hard definition)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_broad
label: Coronary events and incidents, broad definition
description: Has the study participant had coronary events (broad definition)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: visits_range
label: Health professional visits, age range
description: Time range to which following visit data refers to. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: chd_ap
label: Coronary events and incidents, angina pectoris
description: Coronary events and incidents: Angina pectoris. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_mi
label: Coronary events and incidents, myocardial infarction
description: Coronary events and incidents: Myocardial infarction. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_acs
label: Coronary events and incidents, acute coronary syndrome
description: Coronary events and incidents: Acute coronary syndrome. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_revasc
label: Coronary events and incidents, coronary revascularisation procedures
description: Coronary events and incidents: Coronary revascularisation procedures. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: chd_si
label: Coronary events and incidents, silent ischemia
description: Coronary events and incidents: Silent ischemia. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: car_plaques
label: Carotid plaques
description: Carotid plaques. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: death
label: Mortality
description: Indicator variable for death of the individual. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: hosp
label: Hospitalized as an inpatient
description: Was the study participant hospitalized? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (hosp_range).

name: hosp_range
label: Hospitalized as an inpatient, time
description: Time range in months to which hosp refers to. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hosp_n
label: Number of hospitalizations
description: How many times the study participant was hospitalized? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (hosp_n_range).

name: hosp_n_range
label: Number of hospitalizations, time
description: Time range in months to which hosp_n refers to. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years.

name: hosp_nights
label: Number of hospitalizations, number of nights
description: Total number of nights of hospitalization reported in hosp_n. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years and method for each measure.

name: drugs_v
label: Drug use, V) Various drug use.
description: Drug use, V) Various drug use. Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (drugs_range).

name: visits_dentist
label: Health professional visits, dentist or orthodontist
description: How many times the study participant has seen dentist or dental hygiensit? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_orthodontist
label: Health professional visits, orthodontist
description: How many times the study participant has seen orthodontist? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_gp
label: Health professional visits, GP (general practitioner) or family doctor
description: How many times the study participant has seen GP or family doctor? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_specialist
label: Health professional visits, specialist
description: How many times the study participant has seen any health care specialist (i.e. non-GP visit)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: visits_nurse
label: Health professional visits, nurse or midwife
description: How many times the study participant has seen nurse (incl. midwife, physician assistant, GP-assistant)? Provide repeated measures in long format with corresponding age in years, method for each measure and time range to which this refers to (visits_range).

name: drugs_range
